DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop effective , low-cost , telephone-based intervention reduce anxiety , depression , feeling burden stress caregiver patient dementia . This study also determine whether intervention alter course dementia .
DOC.brief_title: Telephone-Based Support Caregivers Patients With Dementia
DOC.detailed_description: Caregivers randomize receive either telephone-based intervention standard medical care . Both group receive resource packet contain information care someone dementia list local resource . Caregivers intervention group also receive series telephone call 12 month , education , emotional support , train problem-solving skill provide trained therapist . Caregivers standard care group receive additional psychosocial intervention . Participants assess pre-treatment , mid-treatment ( 6 month ) , post-treatment , 3-month follow-up .
